name: Sky Drifter
description:
Drift the skies with your ragtag ship.

Controls
  • Steer: Mouse / Left Analogue
  • Fire: LMB / Right Trigger

You can skip the tutorial using Escape / B.

Collect energy from fallen enemies to charge your ship.

Credits
  • Engineering: Ed Lu
  • Game Design/Art: Nick Amlag
  • Composition: Jon Russell

Sounds from BFXR and Soniss' free GDC packs.
Made with Unity.
